card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Kyrstron, Lair Delver
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Totto Pipicchi
card.text: ■ Each creature in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race has "speed attacker." ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Chitta Peloru
card.text: ■ All Dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

card.name: Überdragon Sunburst NEX
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap it. ■ Whenever this creature would battle a creature that has power 12000 or more, this creature gets +11000 power. ■ Double Breaker

card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Samurai Generation ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it's tapped.

card.name: Flameburn Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

If that card is a creature you may put it under this creature. card.name: Hyperspatial Shooting Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Lupia Lapia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put it into your mana zone instead. If you do, you may return a Dragon from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Legend Lupia Wing
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ This card may be crossed to a creature that has Lupia in its name For No Cost ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from it, show it your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Massu Lupia
card.text: ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have NEX or Lupia in its name gets +1000 power.

card.name: Toppa Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever a creature that has "NEX" in its name battles, you may destroy this creature. If you do, untap that creature and it wins the battle.

card.name: Soul Burn Dragon

card.name: Reppi Aini
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.
